resources.string:
Software Developer | Oracle Apps Developer


Contact:
 +254792782402 Â· nyawiramwangi394@gmail.com
 Tatu City, Nairobi, Kenya


I am an experienced software developer with expertise in Oracle databases, Java programming, C#, and cloud computing on AWS.
 I specialize in developing and optimizing enterprise solutions with a focus on automation and process efficiency. Proficient in Oracle Applications and ERP modules, I work to improve business operations through scalable, impactful solutions.


I am passionate about using technology to achieve the UN Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) and have successfully led projects addressing global challenges.


Key Skills:
 - Oracle Apps Development
 - Backend Development (C# and Java)
 - Restful APIs
 - Cloud Computing (AWS)
 - Databases and Business Intelligence
 - Data Analysis and Problem Solving
 - Version Control and Teamwork


Professional Experience:
 Software Developer | Oracle Apps Developer
 E&M Technology House Limited (Jan 2024 - Present)


Key Accomplishments:
 - Developed and implemented Oracle applications, improving operational efficiency and reporting.
 - Administered user roles and security in Oracle E-Business Suite and Newgen.
 - Led the development of SACCO Agents and Insurance Hub systems using C#.NET.
 - Developed a Fixed Assets Management application using Spring Boot.
 - Deployed backend APIs on AWS EC2, optimizing performance with auto-scaling and load balancing.
 - Enhanced database performance and security through optimization and encryption.


Education:
 - Bachelor of Science in Actuarial Science, University of Nairobi (2017-2021) - Second Class Upper Honors
 - Corporate Finance Institute: Business Intelligence & Data Analysis, Financial Management & Valuation Analysis
